purpose: Creates the legal entity (Sdn Bhd) required to sign the lease and hold the biosafety licenses.
Registers the Institutional Biosafety Committee (IBC). This is the "single most critical administrative step" without which no research notification can occur.+1
Internal validation that the lab meets PC2 specs. Must be completed before submitting Form E.+1
Notification for "Contained Use." Submitting this allows the lab to legally commence work with LMOs (like HEK293T) immediately upon acknowledgement.+1
Registers the facility as a waste generator (Code SW 404). Mandatory before generating the first batch of biological waste.
Legalizes the autoclave. As a pressure vessel, it cannot be operated for waste sterilization without this certificate.
